item.description:
Hey guys!

A Monday climb, yet again!

I hope everyone had a great Thanksgiving and stuffed their faces!!!! If you did, then this will offer the PERFECT excuse to work off some of that excess weight you may have gained. If you get me as a belay partner, I promise not to make tooooo many exaggerated huffing and puffing noises whilst you climb (unless you're Sandra). ;)

Keep an eye out for the girl in the green t-shirt with the shamrock...perhaps a spare tire or two.

Kerri :)
item.name: Meetup Monday, November 26 at 7 pm
